content: अन्वाधेयं --यकं A sort of स्त्रीधन or woman's property, presented to her after marriage by her husband's or father's family, or by her own relatives; विवाहात्परतो यच्च लब्धं भर्तृकुलात्स्त्रिया . अन्वाधेयं तु तद्द्रव्यं लब्धं पितृ- (<ab>v. l.</ab> बंधु-) कुलात्तथा .. <ls>Kāty.</ls> quoted by <ls>Kull.</ls> on <ls>Ms. 9. 195</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 144.</ls>
